page.title: 20OWERMOIGNE CHILDRENS GAMES/2
page.content: OUR FAVOURITE{PLAYGROUND GAMES } {ARE- BALL TOUCH-}CHILD WITH A BALL SHOUTS 'STOP' AND THROWS IT AT SOMEONE.IF IT HITS, THAT CHILD IS ON. {OFF-GROUND TOUCH-}LIKE CHASE BUT YOU ARE SAFE OFF THE GROUND.{BLOCK 123 IN- A CHILD COUNTS BY A POST THEN LOOKS FOR THE OTHERS.WHEN FOUND THEY BOTH RUN TO THE POST AND SHOUT "BLOCK 123 IN".{MARBLES-}HIT SOMEONE'S MARBLE WITH YOURS OR DROP YOUR MARBLE TO KNOCK HIS OUT OF A CIRCLE AND THEN YOU CAN KEEP HIS.{FISHES-}CHILDREN SIT IN CIRCLE.IN ROTATION THEY ARE GIVEN THE NAMES OF 6 FISH.WHEN 1 FISH IS CALLED THOSE WITH THAT NAME GET UP AND WALK ROUND THE CIRCLE.ON THE INSTRUCTIONS "CHOPPY WATER" THEY SKIP ROUND,"ROUGH WATER" THEY RUN,"TIDE TURN"THEY WALK THE OTHER WAY,"TIDE COME IN"THEY RACE BACK TO OWN PLACE.LAST ONE BACK IS OUT.
